name: Figma Unsplash Challenge | Design Daily
description:
Discover a new way of using the famous stock free image platform Unsplash!

By using the feature Insert Random, the plugin fills your artboard with randomly selected images. We use this function to improve our layout, graphic design and analytic skills. Use the first random image you get and redesign it! No cheating. You are forced to think of new ways to implement this image and get in touch with unusual subjects.

Credits to Lorenzo Doremi who published an article about this method on Medium. Find the article here : https://uxplanet.org/the-one-and-only-figma-plugin-you-need-to-improve-your-graphic-design-skills-79d8c02b02f4
